verses.verse: <S%G1899>Then<s%> <S%G1223>after<s%> an interval of <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> I <S%G305>went<s%> up <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> with <S%G921>Barnabas,<s%> <S%G4838>taking<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%> <S%G4838>along<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

And it was <S%G2596>because<s%> of a <S%G602>revelation<s%> that I <S%G305>went<s%> up; and I <S%G394>submitted<s%> to them the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> but [I did so] in <S%G2596>private<s%> <S%G2398><s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who were of <S%G1380>reputation,<s%> for <S%G3381>fear<s%> that I might be <S%G5143>running,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> had <S%G5143>run,<s%> in <S%G2756>vain.<s%>
But not <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> was with me, though he was a <S%G1672>Greek,<s%> was <S%G315>compelled<s%> to be <S%G4059>circumcised.<s%>

But [it was] <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G5569>false<s%> <S%G5569>brethren<s%> who had <S%G3920>sneaked<s%> in to <S%G2684>spy<s%> out our <S%G1657>liberty<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> to <S%G2615>bring<s%> us into <S%G2615>bondage.<s%>

But we did not <S%G1502>yield<s%> in <S%G5292>subjection<s%> to them for <S%G3761>even<s%> an <S%G5610>hour,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that the <S%G225>truth<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> might <S%G1265>remain<s%> with you.

But from <S%G3588>those<s%> who were of <S%G5100>high<s%> <S%G1380>reputation<s%> <S%G3697>(what<s%> they were <S%G1308>makes<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G1308>difference<s%> to me; <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2983>shows<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4383>partiality<s%>) – <S%G1063>well,<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who were of <S%G1380>reputation<s%> <S%G4323>contributed<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> to me.

But on the <S%G5121>contrary,<s%> <S%G3708>seeing<s%> that I had been <S%G4100>entrusted<s%> with the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> to the <S%G203>uncircumcised,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as <S%G4074>Peter<s%> [had been] to the <S%G4061>circumcised<s%>

(for He who <S%G1754>effectually<s%> <S%G1754>worked<s%> for <S%G4074>Peter<s%> in [his] <S%G651>apostleship<s%> to the <S%G4061>circumcised<s%> <S%G1754>effectually<s%> <S%G1754>worked<s%> for me <S%G2532>also<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>),

and <S%G1097>recognizing<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that had been <S%G1325>given<s%> to me, <S%G2385>James<s%> and <S%G2786>Cephas<s%> and <S%G2491>John,<s%> who were <S%G1380>reputed<s%> to be <S%G4769>pillars,<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> to me and <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> the <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hand<s%> of <S%G2842>fellowship,<s%> that we [might go] to the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> and they to the <S%G4061>circumcised.<s%>
[They] <S%G3440>only<s%> [asked] us to <S%G3421>remember<s%> the <S%G4434>poor<s%> – the <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G846>thing<s%> I <S%G2532>also<s%> was <S%G4704>eager<s%> to <S%G4160>do.<s%>
But <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2786>Cephas<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G490>Antioch,<s%> I <S%G436>opposed<s%> him to his <S%G4383>face,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he stood <S%G2607>condemned.<s%>

For <S%G4253>prior<s%> to the <S%G2064>coming<s%> of <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G5100>men<s%> from <S%G2385>James,<s%> he used to <S%G4906>eat<s%> with the <S%G1484>Gentiles;<s%> but <S%G3753>when<s%> they <S%G2064>came,<s%> he [began] to <S%G5288>withdraw<s%> and <S%G873>hold<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G873>aloof,<s%> <S%G5399>fearing<s%> the party of the <S%G4061>circumcision.<s%>

And the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4942>joined<s%> him in <S%G4942>hypocrisy,<s%> with the <S%G5620>result<s%> that <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> was <S%G4879>carried<s%> <S%G4879>away<s%> by their <S%G5272>hypocrisy.<s%>

But <S%G3753>when<s%> I <S%G3708>saw<s%> that they were not <S%G3716>straightforward<s%> <S%G4314>about<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel,<s%> I <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G2786>Cephas<s%> in the <S%G1715>presence<s%> of <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> you, <S%G5225>being<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1483>like<s%> the <S%G1483>Gentiles<s%> and not <S%G2452>like<s%> the <S%G2452>Jews,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> [is it that] you <S%G315>compel<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> to <S%G2450>live<s%> <S%G2450>like<s%> <S%G2450>Jews<s%>?
"We [are] <S%G2453>Jews<s%> by <S%G5449>nature,<s%> and not <S%G268>sinners<s%> from <S%G1537>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles;<s%>

<S%G1161>nevertheless<s%> <S%G3609>knowing<s%> that a <S%G444>man<s%> is not <S%G1344>justified<s%> by the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>Law<s%> but <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> we have <S%G4100>believed<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> that we may be <S%G1344>justified<s%> by <S%G4102>faith<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and not by the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>Law;<s%> <S%G3754>since<s%> by the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>Law<s%> shall <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> be <S%G1344>justified.<s%>

"But <S%G1487>if,<s%> while <S%G2212>seeking<s%> to be <S%G1344>justified<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> we <S%G846>ourselves<s%> have <S%G2532>also<s%> been <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G268>sinners,<s%> is <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> a <S%G1249>minister<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%>? May it <S%G3361>never<s%> be!
"For <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G3618>rebuild<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I have [once] <S%G2647>destroyed,<s%> I <S%G4921>prove<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> to be a <S%G3848>transgressor.<s%>
"For <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3551>Law<s%> I <S%G599>died<s%> to the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> that I might <S%G2198>live<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

"I have been <S%G4957>crucified<s%> with <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> and it is <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>longer<s%> I who <S%G2198>live,<s%> but <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2198>lives<s%> in me; and the [life] <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> I <S%G2198>live<s%> by <S%G4102>faith<s%> in the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G25>loved<s%> me, and <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G1438>Himself<s%> up for me.

"I do not <S%G114>nullify<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> for <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> [comes] <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G1431>needlessly.<s%>"
